title: Vegan Chocolate Mocha Squares
ingredients: ['350g (12 oz) silken tofu, undrained', '2 tablespoons safflower oil', '1 pinch salt', '450g (16 oz) demerara sugar', '5 tablespoons good quality cocoa powder', '5 tablespoons instant decaffeinated coffee', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '100g (4 oz) wholemeal flour']
